5df75cf16b05c.Name: LLPG - MYSERVICES - address postcode lookup
5df75cf16b05c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59c0a03ddebc1","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) AS display, uprn AS name,
sao AS flat,
pao AS house,
street_name AS street,
town_name AS town , 
county_name AS county,
postcode,
uprn,
ward,
lng,
lat,
locality_name AS locality,
usrn
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

props.label: staticText 1
props.content:
Before completing this form please read the Guidance Notes.

Please Note: You must provide online payment for this licence after completing the form. After clicking the submit button at the end of the form you will be taken to our secure online payment website. You can then make the required payment using either a credit or a debit card.

Cost of application: £37.00

props.content: Please note that your session may timeout without warning while completing this form. To ensure you do not lose your work please click the 'Save' button located at the bottom of each page to save your progress. If prompted, please ensure that you enter a valid email address. You will receive an email from noreply@brentwood.gov.uk containing a link to continue your form.

props.label: staticText 9
props.content: 4. Documentation

props.label: staticText 10
props.content:
The following documents need to be provided as part of this application process:

  1. Two passport photographs of yourself, one of which is endorsed as a true likeness of you by a solicitor or notary, a person of standing in the community or any individual with a professional qualification.

  2. Any licensing qualification held by you or proof that that you are a person of prescribed description.

  3. A criminal conviction certificate or a of criminal record certificate or the results of a subject access search of the police national computer by the National Intelligence Service.

  4. proof of your right to work in the United Kingdom or your share code issued by the Home Office online right to work checking service (see note 2)

props.label: staticText 11
props.content:
Documents in relation to your Personal Licence application should be sent to:

The Licensing Department, Brentwood Borough Council, Town Hall, Ingrave Road, Brentwood, Essex, CM15 8AY.

Please include the reference number for this form, which will be produced when you submit it.

props.label: staticText 12
props.content: 5. Relevant or Foreign Offences

props.label: staticText 13
props.content:
Relevant offences are the offences listed in Schedule 4 to the Licensing Act 2003.

The meaning of foreign offence is dealt with in section 113 of the Licensing Act 2003.

If you are the holder of a justices’ licence and you are applying for a personal licence under regulation 8 of the Licensing Act (Personal licence) Regulations 2005 see paragraphs 23 and 28 in Part 3 of Schedule 8 to the Licensing Act 2003 for the information you are required to give.

If you are convicted of any relevant or foreign offence during the period between when your application is made and when your application is determined or withdrawn, you must notify the authority to which your application was made. Failure to do so without reasonable excuse could lead to prosecution and a fine not exceeding level 4 on the standard scale [£2,500].

Information on the Licensing Act 2003 is available on the website of the Department for Culture, Media and Sport or your local licensing authority.

props.label: Have you ever been convicted of any relevant offence or foreign offence?
staticText 14
props.content:
If you have been convicted of any relevant or foreign offences you must provide details for each conviction, the date of conviction, the name and location of the convicting court, offence of which you were convicted and the sentence imposed.

Please press the 'Finish / Add Another' button to complete the entered details or if you would like to add another offence.

props.label: Offence Details
props.formName: Application for a Personal Licence offences details add USE ONCE
props.minimumRepeatsMessage: Please make sure that you have pressed the 'Finish / Add Another' button

props.label: staticText 21
props.content: Please note that your session may timeout without warning while completing this form. To ensure you do not lose your work please click the 'Save' button located at the bottom of each page to save your progress. If prompted, please ensure that you enter a valid email address. You will receive an email from noreply@brentwood.gov.uk containing a link to continue your form.

props.label: staticText 16
props.content: 6. Declaration

props.label: staticText 17
props.content:
I am entitled to work in the UK and am not subject to a condition preventing me from doing work relating to the carrying on of a licensable activity. I understand that my licence will become invalid if I cease to be entitled to live and work in the UK.

The information contained in this form is correct to the best of my knowledge and belief.

It is an offence to knowingly or recklessly make a false statement in or in connection with an application for the grant of a personal licence. (A person is to be treated as making a false statement if he produces, furnishes, signs or otherwise makes use of a document that contains a false statement). To do so could result in prosecution and a fine of any amount. It is an offence under section 24B of the Immigration Act 1971 to work illegally.

props.label: staticText 18
props.content: 7. Payment

props.label: staticText 19
props.content:
There is standard, non-refundable fee of £37 for every Personal Licence Application.

If you wish to continue, please click "Submit". You will be redirected to a secure payment page where you can enter your payment details. Please do not close your browser.
